2016 Xbox Layout

left Stick - Arcade Drive
Right Stick - Tank Drive

Arm Controls
A - Toggle arm piston
B - Lower Arm Forward
X - Lower Arm Back
Y - 

Left Trigger - Take Picture (Arm)
Right Trigger - Activate Trigger (shoot) - state layout - runs trigger and shooter

Push Left Stick - Toggle Arm Extention
Push Right Stick - Toggle Angle

start - exit vision

Left Bumper - Toggle Intake Piston and intake running
Right Bumper - Toggle shooter (on/off) - state layout does nothing
